title: Journal on letterpress
content:
The fourth issue of Galley Gab...and online journal devoted to letterpress is now up and the pdf can be downloaded from the site below. (There is even an article in it by someone named Hrant Papazian!)

[http://www.galleygab.net](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822064325/http:/www.galleygab.net/ "http://www.galleygab.net")
author: mikeoconnor

comments.content: Ha, I almost fell for it. I was half way through the "Type Table" article before I realized it was April 1! Well done.

Simon, that would have been nice, but it's actually all true! :-/

hhp

Mh..  
This is Don Black. He's well known in Germany and Italy, too.  
Since a year or so he does not have Ludlow matrizes anymore. A friend of mine in Italy bought it. And starting in May we'll offer lead text for bookbinders..

Very senseful article for me, thanks you.

Georg

Georg, good to see you're back on Typophile.

hhp
